mapper.insert: INSERT INTO map(id,latitude, longtitude, place_name) VALUES( #{id}, #{latitude}, #{longtitude}, #{placeName} )
INSERT INTO post(title, content, map_id, member_id) VALUES( #{title}, #{content}, #{mapId}, #{memberId} )
mapper.select: SELECT post.title AS "title", post.content AS "content", post.member_id AS "memberId", post.map_id AS "mapId" FROM map JOIN post on map.id = post.map_id AND map.id = #{mapId}
